inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Volunteer subjects (healthy non-smokers and healthy smokers) will be recruited from within the National Heart and Lung Institute.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: A full medical history and physical examination (including height and weight) will be performed on the initial screening visit, in addition to that recorded in the clinical case notes.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Forced Expiratory Volume per second (FEVI) will be measured using a dry wedge spirometer (Vitalograph, Buckingham, UK)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The subject will inhale 3.5% saline at room temperature, nebulised via a De Vilbiss 99 Ultrasonic nebuliser set

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Fifty (50) millilitres of blood shall be venesected at the study visit.

exclusion.criterion: Asthmatic patients with FEV1 less than 40% predicted value
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Any history or evidence of hepatic, cardiovascular or renal disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has COPD and is acutely ill but oriented and conscious. He smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
